verses.text: Now \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* put \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* names \w were|strong="H3881"\w* Nehemiah \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tirshatha, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H8269"\w* Hacaliah, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* Zedekiah,
Maaziah, Bilgai, Shemaiah; these were \w the|strong="H4918"\w* priests.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H8098"\w* Levites: by name, Jeshua, \w the|strong="H8098"\w* son \w of|strong="H3548"\w* Azaniah, Binnui, \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H8098"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3548"\w* Henadad, Kadmiel,
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3881"\w* brothers, Shebaniah, Hodiah, Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
\w The|strong="H1137"\w* chiefs of \w the|strong="H1137"\w* people: Parosh, Pahath-moab, Elam, Zattu, \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4409"\w* \w the|strong="H1196"\w* rest of \w the|strong="H1196"\w* people, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* priests, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* Levites, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* door-keepers, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* music-makers, \w the|strong="H1196"\w* Nethinim, \w and|strong="H4409"\w* all those who had made themselves separate from \w the|strong="H1196"\w* peoples of \w the|strong="H1196"\w* lands, to keep \w the|strong="H1196"\w* law of God, their wives, their sons, \w and|strong="H4409"\w* their daughters, everyone who had knowledge \w and|strong="H4409"\w* wisdom;

\w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* united \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* brothers, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w rulers|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* put themselves under \w a|strong="H0776"\w* curse \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H0430"\w* oath, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* keep \w their|strong="H3605"\w* steps \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God's \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w which|strong="H0802"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* given \w by|strong="H0413"\w* Moses, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* servant \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* keep \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* orders \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w our|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* decisions \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* rules;

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* daughters \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lands, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* daughters \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sons;

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* come \w to|strong="H5414"\w* do trade \w in|strong="H0776"\w* goods \w or|strong="H3808"\w* food \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Sabbath day, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* do \w no|strong="H3808"\w* trade \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Sabbath \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* holy day: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* seventh year \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* payment \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* debtor.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* rules \w for|strong="H0776"\w* ourselves, taxing ourselves \w a|strong="H3947"\w* third \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* shekel \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* upkeep \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*;

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* holy bread, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w regular|strong="H5656"\w* meal offering \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w regular|strong="H5656"\w* burned offering \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Sabbaths \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* new moon \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fixed|strong="H5975"\w* feasts, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sin-offerings \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* away \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sin \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w work|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Levites \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people, \w made|strong="H4399"\w* selection, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* decision \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* take \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wood \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w regular|strong="H8548"\w* \w times|strong="H4150"\w*, year \w by|strong="H5921"\w* year, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* burned \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* recorded \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law;

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* first-fruits \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H1486"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* first-fruits \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* sort \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*;

\w As|strong="H0935"\w* well \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H1061"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sons \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* cattle, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* recorded \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H1061"\w* lambs \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* herds \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* flocks, \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* taken \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* servants \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0929"\w* we \w would|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* first \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* rough meal, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w lifted|strong="H0935"\w* offerings, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H1121"\w* every sort \w of|strong="H1121"\w* tree, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wine \w and|strong="H1121"\w* oil, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rooms|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tenth \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* produce \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* land \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Levites; \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Levites, \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* tenth \w in|strong="H0935"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* towns \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* ploughed land.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aaron, \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tenths: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w tenth|strong="H4643"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tenths \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rooms|strong="H3957"\w*, \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* store-house;

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5927"\w* \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* grain \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wine \w and|strong="H1121"\w* oil \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rooms|strong="H3957"\w* \w where|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* vessels \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holy \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w*, \w together|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* door-keepers \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* makers \w of|strong="H1121"\w* music: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* we \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H6237"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* caring \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
